CustomField.formula:
IF( MNID_Assets__c > 0,
IF( ISBLANK(Remit_To_Address__c), '', Remit_To_Address__c & BR()) & IF( ISBLANK(Remit_To_City__c), '', Remit_To_City__c & ", ")& IF( ISBLANK(Remit_To_State__c), '', Remit_To_State__c & ", ")& IF( ISBLANK(Remit_To_Zip_Code__c ), '', Remit_To_Zip_Code__c ),
IF( INCLUDES ( Program__c , 'XBS' ), 'Xerox Financial Services' & BR() &
'PO Box 7' & BR() &
'Mount Laurel, NJ 08054', 'Lease Services' & BR() &
'PO Box 37' & BR() &
'Mount Laurel, NJ 08054')
)
CustomField.label: PO
